Title: Blood Ties
Overview: Two brothers, on either side of the law, face off over organized crime in Brooklyn during the 1970s.
production_companies: Wild Bunch, LGM Productions, Les Productions du Trésor, Mars Distribution, Canal+, France Télévision, Worldview Entertainment, Ciné+, M6, France 3 Cinema, Caneo Films, Grisbi Productions, France 4, W9, Chi-Fou-Mi Productions, Treasure Company
